rows.Scenes: The Wedding Hall, Monica and Chandler have just said "I do," and the photographer is taking the required pictures. First of Monica, Chandler, Ross and Joey.]
rows.Content: Photographer: Great. (Takes a picture.) Great! Just give me a sec to change film.ScenesMonica: Okay.ScenesRoss: (To Monica) Okay, I know I’m not supposed to know, but I do. And I’m so excited for you!ScenesJoey: What? What’s going on?ScenesRoss: Monica’s pregnant!ScenesJoey: Oh my God! Is that why you guys had to get married?!ScenesMonica: Guys! I’m not pregnant.ScenesJoey: Ah. (To Chandler) Slow swimmers? (Chandler looks at him.)ScenesRoss: What?! What do you mean? You-you-you’re not pregnant?ScenesMonica: You didn’t tell anybody I was did you?!ScenesRoss: No! (Pause) I’ll be right back. (Exits.)ScenesPhotographer: Now why don’t we get a shot of just Monica and the bloody soldier.ScenesMonica: (To Joey) Oh, about that. Joey, you have to change before the party.ScenesJoey: I can’t! I-I don’t have any other clothes here.ScenesMonica: Find some! Please! Anything that doesn’t say I-I died tragically in France. (Joey leaves to find clothes.)ScenesPhotographer: Well then why don’t we see the bride and the groom and the bridemaids.ScenesPhoebe: Okay. (Phoebe and Rachel join Monica and Chandler on the altar.) Hey Mon, why did you tell the guys you weren’t pregnant?ScenesMonica: Because I’m not.ScenesPhoebe: We found your test in the trash, if you’re not pregnant—(She sees Rachel shaking her head)—It’s because I am.Scenes(Flash, the photographer takes a picture of Monica and Chandler’s stunned faces.)ScenesChandler: What?! What are you talking about?ScenesMonica: What are you talking about?ScenesPhoebe: Yes, I…I am with child. (Flash) And I didn’t want to say anything because it’s your day; I didn’t want to steal your thunder.ScenesMonica: Wait a minute! So you told people I was pregnant?! (Flash) Does this look like a conversation that I want to remember?!ScenesChandler: Who’s the father?ScenesMonica: Yeah!ScenesPhoebe: I can’t say.ScenesMonica: Why?!ScenesChandler: Why not?ScenesPhoebe: I can’t say because he’s famous.ScenesRachel: Oh my God, who is it?! (Phoebe rolls her eyes.)ScenesMonica: Phoebe, come on, you have to tell us.ScenesPhoebe: Okay, okay. It’s James Brolin. James Brolin is the father of my baby.ScenesChandler: As in Barbara Streisand’s husband James Brolin?ScenesPhoebe: What?! Well he never said that to me!ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: The Wedding Hall, continued from earlier.]
rows.Content: Photographer: Why don’t we have Monica step away and we’ll get Chandler and the bridemaids.ScenesPhoebe: How about just the bridemaids?ScenesChandler: Y’know I am the groom right? I was told it was kinda big deal.ScenesPhoebe: It is.ScenesRachel: For you. (Chandler leaves.)ScenesPhoebe: Oh my God!ScenesRachel: Oh, thank you for doing that. I just can’t deal with this just quite yet.ScenesPhoebe: So instead you told me Monica was pregnant.ScenesRachel: You said that she was, I just didn’t disagree with you.ScenesPhoebe: Sneaky.ScenesRachel: Oh yeah.ScenesPhotographer: Smile ladies.ScenesRachel: Oh! (They smile and the picture is taken.) Oh by the way?ScenesPhoebe: Uh-hmm.ScenesRachel: James Brolin?ScenesPhoebe: Oh, I know. I could only think of two names, him and Ed Begley Jr. and then I remembered he’s gay.ScenesRachel: Ed Begley Jr. is not gay.ScenesPhoebe: (intrigued) Really?!

rows.Scenes: The Reception Hall, the party is in full swing.]
rows.Content: Bandleader: Thank you very much! Ladies and gentlemen, it gives me great pleasure to introduce to you for the very first time, Mr. and Mrs. Chandler Bing!Scenes(They enter.)ScenesChandler: Before we go out there I’ve got a present for ya.ScenesMonica: Honey, I’m going to put my hand in your pocket!ScenesChandler: No?ScenesMonica: No.ScenesChandler: I’ve been taking dancing lessons.ScenesMonica: What?!ScenesChandler: Yeah, the last six weeks. I wanted this to be a moment you will never forget.ScenesMonica: Oh that is so sweet!ScenesChandler: So? Would you care to join me in our first dance as husband and wife?ScenesMonica: Yes.Scenes(They walk onto the dance floor and Chandler slips and almost falls.)ScenesMonica: What’s the matter?ScenesChandler: I don’t know, it’s these new shoes, they’re all slippery.ScenesMonica: Well, are you going to be able to do this?ScenesChandler: Not well.Scenes(They start dancing and Chandler starts slipping around.)ScenesMonica: Well, the good news is, I don’t think anyone’s looking at us.Scenes[Cut to Phoebe and Rachel at their table.]ScenesPhoebe: So, are you ready to talk about it?ScenesRachel: No.Scenes(Pause)ScenesPhoebe: Now?ScenesRachel: No!ScenesPhoebe: Okay, we’ll talk about something else then.ScenesRachel: Thank you.ScenesPhoebe: Who’s the father?!ScenesRachel: Ugh! Look honey y’know what? I haven’t told him yet, so until I do I don’t think I should tell anybody else.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah. That’s fine. That’s fair. Is it Tag?ScenesRachel: Phoebe!!ScenesPhoebe: Okay, I’m sorry. I’ll stop.ScenesRachel: Okay.ScenesPhoebe: Is it Ross? It’s Ross isn’t it—Oh my God, it’s Joey!ScenesRachel: Honey, stop it! I am not going to tell you until I tell him.ScenesPhoebe: Ah-hah! At least we know it’s a him.Scenes[Cut to Joey entering wearing a preppy tennis outfit.]ScenesMonica: (seeing him) Oh sweet Lord.ScenesJoey: I’m sorry! Okay? I went down to the gift shop and it’s either this or a bathrobe! Look, what’s more important, the way I’m dressed or me being with you on your special day?ScenesMonica: Honey, I’m not even going to pretend I was listening. (Sees someone else.) Hey! Hey! (Goes over to that person.)Scenes[Cut to the hallway outside the room, Ross is going to see which table he’s at and sees a beautiful woman doing the same thing.]ScenesRoss: Hi. I’m uh, I’m Ross. I don’t, I don’t believe we’ve met. I’m Monica’s older brother.ScenesWoman: Oh hi, I’m, I’m Mona from her restaurant.ScenesRoss: Oh! Hello uh, Mona from her restaurant. (He uses his card to mouth those words.) (Pause) Mona, wow what a, what a beautiful name.ScenesMona: You think so? I’ve always kinda hated it.ScenesRoss: Aw come on, Mona Lisa?ScenesMona: Uh-huh.ScenesRoss: Mona umm…Clickclocken. The famous botanist? Huh? Oh no she’s uh—well she’s dead now. No, supposedly she was once quite the hottie of the plant world.ScenesMona: Really?! Well see? I never knew about her.ScenesRoss: Linda Clickclocken. (Pause) So what uh, what-what table are you at? (She shows him.) Oh, uh me too.ScenesMona: Oh good. Now there’ll be someone there who likes my name.ScenesRoss: (sexily) Yes there will. (Mona leaves and Ross tries to find the same table.) Oh guess what, Molly Gilbert you’ve just been bumped up to table one. And if it’s all right with you I’m gonna take your place at table six—Martin Clickclocken.Scenes[Cut back inside to Joey giving a beautiful woman a tennis lesson by standing behind her.]ScenesJoey: That’s better, now just bend your arms a little more. There you go. Okay, look straight ahead. Now this time I want you to really put your ass into it. (They do a practice swing and she really puts her ass into it.)Scenes[Cut to Chandler sitting down near Joey as his mom walks over. His birth mother, not the mother who recently visited one of those clinics in Sweden.]ScenesMrs. Bing: Chandler darling! Look, my date has finally arrived. I’d like you to meet Dennis Phillips.ScenesDennis Phillips: Congratulations.ScenesChandler: Thank you.ScenesMrs. Bing: Dennis is a dear old friend and a fantastic lover.ScenesChandler: Bravo Dennis thanks for pleasing my mother so.ScenesDennis Phillips: Oh, I’m so sorry I missed the ceremony, I was stuck at auditions.ScenesMrs. Bing: Oh yes, Dennis is directing a new Broadway show.ScenesJoey: I don’t believe we’ve met, Joey Tribbiani.ScenesDennis Phillips: Dennis PhillipsScenesJoey: Wow, I’ve admired your work for years. You-you’ve done some really amazing stuff.ScenesDennis Phillips: Oh, thank you. Well if you’ll excuse me, I’m gonna go get myself a drink. Be back in a moment. (Walks away.)ScenesJoey: Wow Dennis Phillips! That’s great! How did you guys meet?ScenesMrs. Bing: Well, it’s a funny story.ScenesChandler: Funny: ha-ha or funny: (Mimes blowing his brain out.)Scenes[Time lapse. The band is finishing another song.]ScenesBandleader: Thank you, thank you very much. If everyone will please take your seats, dinner will be served.Scenes(Ross starts looking for table six and finds out that it’s the kid’s table. He sees Mona sitting at another table.)ScenesRoss: Hey! Uh, I thought, I thought you were at table six.ScenesMona: No, nine. (Shows him the card again.)ScenesRoss: Oh see, before you uh, when you showed it to me you-you held it that way (he turns her hand upside down) which uh, which was misleading. Well I’m… (He goes at sits down at his new table and the kids stare at him.) Hello.Scenes[Cut to the hallway, Chandler is putting tape on the bottom of his shoes.]ScenesJoey: Chandler. Will you see if your mom can give my resume to Dennis Phillips? ‘Cause if I can get in a Broadway show then I would’ve done it all, film, television, and theater. The only think left would be radio, and that’s just for ugly people.ScenesChandler: What size shoes do you wear?ScenesJoey: Uh, eleven, eleven and a half.ScenesChandler: Great, because my shoes are giving me a little problem on the dance floor, can I borrow the boots from your costume?ScenesJoey: Uh, I don’t even really know where I left those. Sorry.ScenesChandler: (looking at Joey’s feet) Those aren’t eleven and a half.ScenesJoey: Okay fine! I’m a seven! All right, I have surprisingly small feet. But the rest of me is good, I’ll show ya!Scenes[Cut to Monica and Rachel at their table.]ScenesMonica: Can you believe Phoebe got pregnant?!ScenesRachel: Oh y’know what honey? Let’s not talk about that right now?ScenesMonica: This is so huge.ScenesRachel: Sure, but come on, as big as your wedding?ScenesMonica: Of course not nothing is. Between me and you…ScenesRachel: Yeah.ScenesMonica: …in this day and age how dumb do you have to be to get pregnant?ScenesRachel: Hey! Y’know, sometimes you can do everything right, everyone can wear everything they’re supposed to wear, and one of those little guys just gets through!ScenesMonica: How?ScenesRachel: I don’t know! Maybe they have tools.ScenesMonica: Well I-I talked to and uh, she’s definitely going to have this baby. Y’know, she said she was gonna raise it on her own.ScenesRachel: Well, maybe that’s, maybe that’s really brave.ScenesMonica: Maybe. I just hope she realizes how hard it’s gonna be.ScenesRachel: Maybe she hasn’t really thought it through that well.ScenesMonica: Well, there’s a lot to think about. I mean, how is she, how is she going to handle this financially? How is she going to juggle work? Does she realize she’s not going to have a date again for the next eighteen years?ScenesRachel: (starting to cry) I don’t know.ScenesMonica: Are you okay?ScenesRachel: Uh-hmm. I’m just thinking about Phoebe; poor knocked up Phoebe.ScenesWaiter: Champagne?ScenesRachel: Oh yes! Thank you very much! (She grabs a glass, takes a sip, and realizes what she just did. She then tries to spit the champagne back into the glass without Monica noticing. It doesn’t work.) Oh that’s-that’s actually how the French drink it.Scenes(Monica gasps.)ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: continued from earlier, only now Phoebe joins them.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Well, I just got off the phone with my lover, James Brolin…ScenesMonica: Oh really?!ScenesPhoebe: Yes, and apparently he is married to some singer, but he said he would leave her for me. And I said, "James, James Brolin, are you sure?" James Brolin said…ScenesMonica: (interrupting) Rachel’s really the one who’s pregnant.ScenesPhoebe: (shocked) What?! (deadpan) Why bother?ScenesMonica: How do you feel?ScenesRachel: I don’t know. I don’t know how I feel. This is all happening so fast. I have to make all these decisions that I don’t want to make. (Takes another sip of champagne and spits it back out) Somebody just take this away from me!!ScenesPhoebe: Calm down. Maybe you’re not pregnant.ScenesRachel: What?!ScenesPhoebe: When I got pregnant with the triplets, I took that test like three times just to make sure.ScenesMonica: Yes! Maybe it’s a false positive. Are you sure you peed on the stick right?ScenesRachel: How many ways are there to do that?ScenesPhoebe: I’m-I’m just saying, don’t freak out until you’re a hundred percent sure.ScenesRachel: All right, I’ll-I’ll take it again when I get home.ScenesMonica: You-you gotta take it now. Come on, do it as a present to me.ScenesRachel: Okay. Thank you.ScenesMonica: Okay.ScenesPhoebe: I’ll run out and get you one.ScenesRachel: Oh, you guys are so great.ScenesMonica: Oh, wait a minute! Who’s is the father?!ScenesPhoebe: Oh no, she won’t tell us.ScenesMonica: Oh, come on it’s my wedding! That can be my present.ScenesRachel: Wh—Hey, I just gave you peeing on a stick.ScenesPhoebe: See? This is why you register.Scenes[Cut to Ross at the kiddie table. He reaches for something and a fart noise emanates which causes the kids to laugh.]ScenesRoss: It was the chair again! Okay? I’m not doing it! It what—look, I don’t—y’know what—eh-eh… (He walks away and goes over to Mona.) Hi.ScenesMona: Hi!ScenesRoss: Umm, would you like to dance?ScenesMona: Sure.ScenesRoss: Yeah?ScenesMona: Yeah.ScenesRoss: Oh great! (They get up to dance and Ross is interrupted by a little girl.)ScenesLittle Girl: Dr. Geller?ScenesRoss: I wasn’t farting! (To Mona) Uh, a little game from our table. (To the little girl) Yes?ScenesLittle Girl: Dr. Geller, will you dance with me?ScenesRoss: Oh umm, well uh, maybe-maybe later. Right now, I’m about to dance with this lady.ScenesLittle Girl: Okay. (She drops her head in disappointment and walks away.)ScenesMona: Ohhhh!ScenesRoss: Uh, unless! Unless, uh this lady wouldn’t mind letting you go first.ScenesMona: I’d be happy to. (To Ross) You are very sweet.ScenesRoss: Yes I-I am. In fact umm hey, why don’t we try it my special way? You can dance on my feet.ScenesLittle Girl: Sure!ScenesRoss: Yeah? Hop on. (They start dancing and Mona sits down.) Is the pretty lady looking?ScenesLittle Girl: Uh-huh.ScenesRoss: Keep dancing.Scenes[Cut to Chandler in the hallway practicing dancing and is doing it very well.]ScenesChandler: And the world will never know.ScenesJoey: Hey! Did you talk to Dennis about me yet?ScenesChandler: Yes, I told him how talented you were. I told him all about Days Of Our Lives.ScenesJoey: No-no! No! No! You don’t tell a Broadway guy that! Now he just thinks I’m a soap actor.ScenesChandler: But you’re not just a soap actor. You are a soap actor with freakishly tiny feet.ScenesJoey: Hey!Scenes[Joey walks back inside just as Ross’s dance is finishing.]ScenesLittle Girl: Thank you.ScenesRoss: No-no, thank you Miranda.ScenesLittle Girl: Melinda!ScenesRoss: All right. (Walks over to Mona.)ScenesMona: How cute was that?ScenesRoss: Oh-oh, were you, were you watching?Scenes(Another little girl walks over to him.)ScenesSecond Girl: Can I go next?ScenesRoss: What? Of course you can! Hop on!ScenesMona: Okay, but I get to hop on after her. (Ross bites the air in response.)ScenesRoss: I am so gonna score.ScenesSecond Girl: What?ScenesRoss: I like your bow.Scenes[Behind them, Joey goes up to the bandleader and interrupts the song.]ScenesJoey: (clinks his glass) I’d like to propose a toast. To Monica and Chandler, the greatest couple in the world. And my best friends. Now, my when I first found out they were getting married I was, I was a little angry. I was like, (overly angry) "Why God? Why? How can you take them away from me?!" But then I thought back over all our memories together, some happy memories. (Does a fake laugh.) And-and there was some sad memories. (Starts to break down and cry.) I’m sorry. And-and some scared memories—Whoa! (He jumps back, startled.) Eh? And then, and then I realized I’ll always be their friend, their friend who can speak in many dialects and has training in stage combat and is willing to do partial nudity. (Starts to walk away, but realizes something.) Oh! To the happy couple!Scenes[Time Lapse, the interrupted song is finishing.]ScenesBandleader: Thank you.ScenesRoss: (to the second girl) That was very nice Ashley.ScenesAshley: Can we do it again?ScenesRoss: No-no. (Walks over to Mona again.)ScenesMona: So, is it my turn now?Scenes(A large little fat girl walks over.)ScenesFat Girl: I’m next!ScenesRoss: Oh! (Recoils in horror.)ScenesMona: Uh, that’s okay. You can dance with her first.ScenesRoss: Oh, you-you sure? (She nods yes.) Okay. (To the girl) Okay. So what’s uh, what’s your name.ScenesFat Girl: Gert!ScenesRoss: That’s, that’s pretty. (They start to dance and Gert tries to step on Ross’s feet, but he pulls them out of harm’s way.) Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! What are you doing there Gert?ScenesGert: Dancing on your feet! Like the other girls did it.ScenesRoss: Okay. (Swallows hard.) Hop on Gert. (She does and Ross winces in pain.)ScenesGert: Why aren’t you moving your feet?ScenesRoss: I’m trying. (He strains to move his feet.)ScenesGert: Faster! You’re not going fast enough!ScenesRoss: Maybe I should stand on your feet! (Gert’s shocked and Ross realizes what he said and tries to brush it off.)Scenes[Cut to Joey going over to talk to Dennis Phillips.]ScenesJoey: So did you uh, happen to catch my toast up there?ScenesDennis Phillips: Oh my God, that was for my benefit?ScenesJoey: Well, I’d like to think there was something for everyone. Look, I know you’re casting for this new show…ScenesDennis Phillips: Look umm Joey, I-I don’t think you’re quite right for this project.ScenesJoey: Oh, see that’s where you’re wrong. Whatever it is I can do it. And if didn’t see it up there, just-just try me.ScenesDennis Phillips: It’s an all Chinese cast. Can you be Chinese?ScenesJoey: Well I’m not proud of this, but… (He turns around and starts to mess with his eyelids.)ScenesDennis Phillips: Oh my God! No-no-no! Please! Please! Don’t-don’t-don’t!Scenes[Cut to Monica walking up to Chandler.]ScenesMonica: Hey, are you ready to get back on the dance floor?ScenesChandler: Did it turn into sand?ScenesMonica: Ohh come on, I love this song! Come on, you’ll be fine. (She starts to walk towards the floor.)ScenesChandler: (sliding up behind her) No. No, I won’t. Do you know why I took all those lessons? See, for the first time I didn’t want you to be embarrassed to be seen on the dance floor with some clumsy idiot.ScenesMonica: Oh sweetie, you can never embarrass me. (Chandler grunts.) Okay, you can easily embarrass me. But come on, it doesn’t matter. All right? I married you! So I want to dance on my wedding night with my husband. Come on. (They go onto the floor.) Just try not to move your feet at all. (Chandler starts to get into the groove and bust a move.) There you go.Scenes(Mr. Geller dances over.)ScenesMr. Geller: Chandler, I’m gonna have you arrested.ScenesChandler: Why?ScenesMr. Geller: You stole my moves. (He starts to dance like Chandler was and Chandler stops.)

rows.Scenes: The Women’s Restroom, Rachel and Phoebe are waiting for the outcome of Rachel’s second test.]
rows.Content: Rachel: How much longer?ScenesPhoebe: 30 seconds.ScenesRachel: 30 seconds, okay.ScenesMonica: (entering) Did I miss it? (Phoebe nods no.) Rachel, I-I want you to know that, if it’s positive, we’re gonna…ScenesRachel: Oh I know. I know. (They hug.)ScenesPhoebe: It’s time.Scenes(Another woman starts to enter.)ScenesThe Girls: No!! (The woman backs out.)ScenesMonica: Go ahead Rach.Scenes(She goes over to look.)ScenesRachel: Oh wait! Y’know what? I can’t, I can’t look at it. I can’t. Somebody else tell me, somebody tell me.ScenesPhoebe: Okay.ScenesRachel: Okay.ScenesPhoebe: Umm, it’s negative.ScenesRachel: What?ScenesPhoebe: It’s negative.ScenesRachel: Oh. Oh. Well there you go. Whew! (Pause) That is—that’s great—that is really great-great news. (Pause) Y’know ‘cause the whole not being ready and kinda the financial aspects, all that. Whew. Wow, this is so just the way it was supposed to be. (Starts to cry.) God.ScenesMonica: Well… Well, great.ScenesPhoebe: Here. (Gives Rachel a tissue.)ScenesRachel: Thanks. (Crying) God this is so stupid! (Pause) How could I be upset over something I never had? It’s negative?ScenesPhoebe: No, it’s positive.ScenesRachel: What?!ScenesPhoebe: It’s-it’s not negative, it’s positive.ScenesRachel: Are you sure?ScenesPhoebe: Well yeah, I lied before.ScenesRachel: Oh!ScenesMonica: Oh God…ScenesPhoebe: Now you know how you really feel about it.ScenesRachel: Oh-oh, that’s a risky little game!ScenesMonica: Are you really gonna do this?ScenesRachel: Yeah. I’m gonna have a baby. I’m gonna have a baby. I’m gonna have a baby! (They all hug.)ScenesPhoebe: With who?ScenesRachel: Ah, it’s still not the time.ScenesDedicated to the People of New York CityScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: The Reception, Joey is helping Ross walk after Gert got through with him and Mona is looking on concerned.]
rows.Content: Ross: I just didn’t see the fast song coming.ScenesJoey: Shh. Shh. Don’t try to talk, we’ll get you up to your room, we’ll soak your feet, you’ll be okay.ScenesRoss: Oh, thank you.ScenesMona: That is so sweet!ScenesJoey: Yeah.ScenesMona: No, I mean it. There are so few genuinely nice guys out there.ScenesJoey: Tell me about it, I feel like I’m holding down the fort all by myself.ScenesMona: It’s Joey right?ScenesJoey: Yeah.ScenesRoss: Wait a minute! No! I’m the nice one! I’m the one who danced with the kids all night! How…How small are your feet?! (They all look down.)ScenesEndScenesThe One With The Red SweaterScenesWritten by: Dana Klein BorkowScenesDirected by: David SchwimmerScenesTranscribed by: Eric Aasen

rows.Scenes: The Hotel Lobby, Rachel and Phoebe are at the front desk checking out.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Listen y’know what sir? For the last time, I don’t care what the computer says, we did not take a bag of Mashuga nuts from the mini-bar and we did not watch Dr. Do-Me-A-Little!ScenesJoey: (entering) Hey!ScenesPhoebe: Oh! Joey uh, were you in our room last night?ScenesJoey: No. (Phoebe grabs the receipt and shows it to Joey who gets mad.) I was told the name of the movie would not appear on the bill!Scenes(Chandler and Monica enter.)ScenesChandler: (to the front desk clerk) Hi! We’re checking out of the bridal suite.ScenesMonica: (depressed) That’s right. I’m no longer a bride. I’ll never be a bride again. Now, I’m just someone’s wife!ScenesChandler: And I’m the happiest guy in the world! (Monica goes and sits down in a huff.) Oh honey, come on don’t be upset. We still have so much to look forward to!ScenesMonica: Oh yeah, right. (Rolls her eyes.)ScenesChandler: We got the honeymoon.ScenesMonica: That’s not ‘til Thursday.ScenesChandler: The wedding pictures?ScenesMonica: They won’t be ready for weeks.ScenesChandler: Not the disposable cameras from the tables.ScenesMonica: That’s true! (Happily) I knew I married you for a reason!ScenesChandler: I’ll tell you what, I will go get them developed and you can go home.ScenesMonica: Okay.Scenes(Joey giggles.)ScenesChandler: What? What did you take a picture of?ScenesJoey: Nothing! It was something.ScenesChandler: Okay Ross has the cameras, has he checked out yet?ScenesRachel: Are you joking? Check out is not ‘til noon and he has a good (checks her watch) eleven minutes left.ScenesChandler: Oh.ScenesMonica: Ross has never checked out of a room a minute before he had to.ScenesRachel: Yeah, one time, when we were dating, uh we got a late checkout, he got so excited it was the best sex we ever had. Until y’know, he screamed out Radisson at the end.ScenesChandler: Okay, well I’m gonna get Ross, get the cameras, and get them developed. (Joey laughs again.) 32 Joe. You’re 32! (Exits)ScenesFront Desk Clerk: (To Monica) Here’s a copy of your bill.ScenesMonica: Oh thanks. (Reading the bill) Champagne, strawberries…Oh my God! I can’t believe Chandler ordered porn on our wedding night!ScenesJoey: Yeah, that’s sad. Mashuga nut?ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: Ross’s Hotel Room, he is letting Chandler in.]
rows.Content: Ross: Hi.ScenesChandler: Hey. (He sees that Ross is packing all of the hotel toiletries) Soaps? Shampoos? Are you really taking all this stuff?ScenesRoss: Why not? It’s built into the price of the room.ScenesChandler: Yeah but you don’t need—(Picks up something)—What is this?ScenesRoss: Thread!ScenesChandler: Score! Where are the disposable cameras?ScenesRoss: What disposable cameras?ScenesChandler: The cameras? Remember last night I told you to take them?ScenesRoss: No you didn’t.ScenesChandler: Yes! Remember? Right before we cut the cake, I went up to you and I said…ScenesRoss: Oh-oh yeah, you-you came up to me and asked if I could do you a favor, and my Uncle Murray came up to you and handed you a check. And then you said, "Why do they call it a check? Why not a Yugoslavian?" (Chandler laughs.) Yeah, then you did that.ScenesChandler: So you don’t have the cameras?!ScenesRoss: No. Sorry man.ScenesChandler: So? What? What? They’re gone! Monica’s gonna freak!ScenesRoss: Well, I’m sure they’re still somewhere here in the hotel. I’ll-I’ll help you look for them.ScenesChandler: Great.ScenesRoss: In-in three minutes.Scenes(Chandler goes into the bathroom, closes the door, and then opens it again right away. Ross looks up and hands him the toilet paper Ross already packed.)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's, Phoebe is entering to see Monica sitting in front of a mound of wedding gifts.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Hey!ScenesMonica: Hey!ScenesPhoebe: Are you gonna open the presents without Chandler?ScenesMonica: No! (Pause) But, they’re callin’ out to me! I mean this little guy (Holds up a small one) even crawled up into my lap. Oh come on, Chandler wouldn’t mind if I opened just one present! What do you think it is?ScenesPhoebe: A little mirror that when you look into it you see yourself as an old woman.Scenes(Monica opens it anyways.)ScenesMonica: A tiny salt shaker!!!ScenesPhoebe: Ohhh! My God! For tiny salt!ScenesMonica: Oh wow! Okay. Well that was fun.ScenesPhoebe: Oh yeah.ScenesMonica: Good. Okay, I’m just gonna wait for Chandler to open the rest of them.ScenesPhoebe: Okay.ScenesMonica: Whew. Although y’know, this is part of a salt and pepper set. I mean… I guess y’know it may just count as a half a present. What do you think?ScenesPhoebe: Well I guess it’s okay to open one more if it’s part of a set. Y’know, it’s probably this one. (Grabs another small one.)ScenesMonica: Or this one! (She grabs and starts to open the biggest present.)ScenesRachel: (entering) Hi.ScenesMonica: Hey, how are you feelin’? Any morning sickness?ScenesRachel: Shh-shh-shh! The guys don’t know yet do they?ScenesMonica: No! Joey and Ross don’t know anything and Chandler still thinks that Phoebe’s pregnant.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah that’s right Chandler does still think I’m pregnant. He hasn’t asked me how I’m feeling or offered to carry my bags. Boy, I feel bad for the woman who ends up with him. (Monica looks at her.) After you of course.ScenesRachel: Don’t worry I promise that you will only have to be pregnant for a few more hours, ‘cause I’m going to tell the father today.ScenesPhoebe: Ooh, is it someone in this building? Is it that tall guy from the first floor?ScenesRachel: Ew! No!ScenesPhoebe: What?! I think he’s cute.ScenesRachel: Well then you have his baby.ScenesPhoebe: Believe me I’m trying.ScenesMonica: Wow. Y’know it is so weird. I mean, you’re gonna tell this guy today and he has no idea what’s gonna happen.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah. You’re just gonna knock on his door and change his life forever. You’re like Ed McMahon except without the big check, or the raw sexual magnetism.ScenesRachel: Yeah. Uh-huh, I guess it is pretty big news.ScenesPhoebe: Pretty big? It’s huge! God, this guy doesn’t have a clue! He’s just walking down the street thinking, ‘I had sex with Rachel Green. I rock!’ then bam! He’s a father and everything’s different.ScenesRachel: Well it’s only different if he wants it to be. I mean, I’m not gonna ask him for anything.ScenesPhoebe: Okay. Then he still has this huge decision to make. Now he’s walking around thinking, ‘Do I want to be a dad?’ and then bam!ScenesMonica: What was that bam?ScenesPhoebe: I don’t. He got…he-he-he-he’s hit by a bus.ScenesJoey: (entering) Hey!ScenesRachel: Hey Joey, what would you do if someone that you slept with told you that she was pregnant?ScenesJoey: (warily) Who called here? Did she sound blond? Huh? Did-did-did she have an accent? I gotta make a call! (Starts to leave) I shoulda never walked into that Sunglass Hut!ScenesRachel: Oh Joey! Joey! No, it’s not you! You didn’t get anybody pregnant!ScenesJoey: Oh. Why would you scare me like that? What the hell is going on? (Pause.) Is somebody pregnant?ScenesPhoebe: Oh yeah. That’s me.ScenesJoey: Oh my God Pheebs! You’re gonna have a baby?ScenesPhoebe: Yes. Yes I am. Oh my God, I’m gonna have a baby! (Joey and Phoebe hug.)ScenesJoey: Whoa, wait a minute. Who’s the father?ScenesPhoebe: You don’t know him. It’s not important. He wants nothing to do with me or the baby. (She sits down like she’s pregnant.)ScenesJoey: Well who is this guy?! Huh? Who is he? ‘Cause I will track him down and kick his ass!ScenesPhoebe: David Lynn.ScenesJoey: David Lynn! David Lynn! David Lynn!! (Exits)ScenesMonica: Who’s David Lynn?ScenesPhoebe: Oh some guy from my gym. A little annoying.

rows.Scenes: The Banquet Room, Chandler is under one of the tables as Ross enters.]
rows.Content: Ross: Chandler?ScenesChandler: Hey! Did you find the cameras?ScenesRoss: No. Did you?ScenesChandler: Yes! And that’s why I’m under the table. Celebrating.ScenesRoss: Well I checked in the uh, lost and found, I talked to the manager, no-one’s turned them.ScenesChandler: Well this is great. Y’know, those cameras were the only thing that was gonna cheer Monica up today, she’s really depressed.ScenesRoss: Now you guys just got married, why is she so depressed?ScenesChandler: All my energy is going into not asking that question. I can’t believe I screwed this up!ScenesRoss: I’m sorry man. (Formally dressed people start to enter.) Here’s a thought. This is the same ballroom. There’s a band. There’s gonna be plenty of dressed up people.ScenesChandler: Are you suggesting we dance our troubles away?ScenesRoss: No-no-no, I’m saying we-we buy more of this (disposable cameras) at the gift shop, throw our tuxes back on, and take a few pictures. All we have to do is make sure not to get anybody else’s faces.ScenesChandler: Are you serious?ScenesRoss: I’m just thinking about your new bride at home. Okay? Do-do you really want to start your life together by letting her down?ScenesChandler: Marriage advice? Really?!ScenesRoss: I’m telling you, this looks exactly like your wedding! Aren’t these the same flowers?ScenesChandler: I don’t know, Monica picked out the flowers.ScenesRoss: What about the chairs?ScenesChandler: She picked those out too.ScenesRoss: How about the place settings?ScenesChandler: That was her.ScenesRoss: What did you do?ScenesChandler: I was in charge of the cameras! Gift shop?ScenesRoss: Hmm. (They head off to the gift shop.)

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, Rachel is sitting on the couch as Phoebe enters.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Hey! Ooh, did you do it yet?ScenesRachel: Not yet.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, well what are you doing here? Are you about to do it? (Gasps) Is it Gunther?ScenesRachel: No! Phoebe, it’s not Gunther.ScenesPhoebe: Thank God, ‘cause that hair on a baby…ScenesRachel: Phoebe the father is not here okay? I haven’t told him yet and I don’t think I can tell him at all now!ScenesPhoebe: Why not?ScenesRachel: I don’t know, let me think. I was walking down the street thinking, ‘I’m gonna tell the father today’ and then bam!ScenesPhoebe: Bus?ScenesRachel: No, you! Phoebe you freaked me out. You kept saying how huge this all is!ScenesPhoebe: Well-well but it is huge.ScenesRachel: I know, but I was just thinking about how huge this is for me. I didn’t even go to how huge this was going to be for the father.ScenesPhoebe: You’re thinking about this way too much. Just tell him and get it over with. It’s like, it’s like ripping off this Band-Aid. (On her arm) Quick and painless, watch. (Rips it off.) Oh mother of…See?

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's, Obsessive Monica has now opened more of the wedding gifts.]
rows.Content: Joey: (entering) Ooh-ooh-ooh! Are we opening presents?ScenesMonica: No! No! I shouldn’t have even opened these! I mean I—Joey I am out of control!! Joey, you have to do me a favor. No matter what I say, no matter what I do, please do not let me open another present! Okay?ScenesJoey: Okay.ScenesMonica: Give me one more.ScenesJoey: Okay. (Hands her one.)ScenesPhoebe: (entering) Hey.ScenesJoey: Oh good, uh you’re here. Uh Pheebs? Listen uh sit down. I-I got something I want to say.ScenesPhoebe: All right. (She sits down like she’s pregnant again.)ScenesJoey: Umm, now uh… It’s a scary world out there, especially for a single mom. Y’know, now I always thought you and I had a special bond so… (He goes to one knee and pulls out a ring.) Phoebe Buffay, will you marry me?ScenesMonica: Oh my God! Joey!ScenesPhoebe: Hell yeah! I’ll marry you! (She grabs the ring and puts it on.)ScenesMonica: You can’t marry him!ScenesPhoebe: Hey lady, your day’s over! It’s my turn!ScenesMonica: Phoebe!ScenesJoey: Why?! Why can’t she marry me?!ScenesPhoebe: I can and I will! (Kisses him.)ScenesMonica: She’s not pregnant. It’s Rachel. Rachel’s the one who’s pregnant.ScenesJoey: Oh my God.ScenesPhoebe: Hey!ScenesMonica: Phoebe I think he would notice if you didn’t have a baby in nine months!ScenesPhoebe: It’s Joey! (Joey turns and looks at her and she mouths ‘I love you’ to him.)ScenesJoey: (smiles then stops) Now I can’t believe it! What? Rachel’s pregnant? (The girls nod yes.) Who’s the father?ScenesPhoebe: We don’t know.ScenesJoey: Ohh… I wonder if that dude.ScenesMonica: There’s a dude?ScenesJoey: Yeah.ScenesPhoebe: Who? Who is it?ScenesJoey: About a month ago this guy spent the night with Rachel, I didn’t see who it was but… (He walks out and closes the door.)ScenesPhoebe: Was that story over?Scenes(They follow him and meet him in the hall coming out of his apartment carrying a sweater.)ScenesJoey: The guy left this.ScenesPhoebe: (gasps) Oh my God! I know who the father is… (She walks into Monica and Chandler’s.)ScenesMonica: People have got to finish their stories!ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: The Banquet Room, Ross and Chandler are in their tuxes and have started to fake the pictures.]
rows.Content: Chandler: (to another couple) Uh, excuse me? Could you take a picture of us?ScenesWoman At The Wedding: Oh! Of course. (Ross and Chandler pose and she takes the picture.)ScenesMan At The Wedding: Uh, would you take one of us?ScenesChandler: Uhh… Yeah sure. (Holds the camera up to his face.) Click!ScenesWoman At The Wedding: It didn’t click.ScenesRoss: I heard it. I heard it.ScenesMan At The Wedding: But there was no flash.ScenesWoman At The Wedding: Why won’t you take our picture?ScenesChandler: Oh yeah. I’ll take, I’ll take your picture. (He takes the picture with his finger over the lens.)ScenesMan At The Wedding: Uh, your finger was covering the lens.ScenesChandler: Who are you? Ansel Adams?! Get outta here!

rows.Scenes: Outside Central Perk, Rachel and Phoebe are about to go inside.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Look, I feel really bad about how I freaked you out before, so I called the father and asked him to meet you here so you can tell him. Go!ScenesRachel: What? Hey wait a minute! Phoebe, how do you even know who the father is?ScenesPhoebe: I may play the fool at times, but I’m a little more than a pretty blond girl with an ass that won’t quit. (She takes the sweater out of her purse.) I believe this belongs to the father of your baby.ScenesRachel: Oh God… Oh, he’s in there right now?ScenesPhoebe: Uh-huh. Now you can turn around or you can go in there and rip the Band-Aid off. What to you want to do?ScenesRachel: Uh, let’s rip!ScenesPhoebe: Really? Are you sure?ScenesRachel: Oh Phoebe!ScenesPhoebe: Okay, sorry. Yeah. (They go inside to confront the father.)ScenesTag: Hey Rach.

rows.Scenes: The Banquet Room, Ross is taking a picture of a plant, Chandler a fork. The band stops.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Why don’t you go up on stage. I’ll get a picture of you doing the speech.ScenesRoss: Okay. Okay!Scenes(He goes up on stage, mimes like he's giving the speech, and Chandler takes his picture. However, before he gets down everyone starts clinking their glasses for a real speech.)ScenesRoss: Will the owner of a 1995 Buick LeSabre please see the front desk? Your car is about to be towed.ScenesAnxious Wedding Guest: (rushing up) That’s my car!ScenesRoss: A ’95 LeSabre?!ScenesAnxious Wedding Guest: Yes!ScenesRoss: A green LeSabre?ScenesAnxious Wedding Guest: Yes!ScenesRoss: I’m sorry, I meant a blue LeSabre.ScenesAnxious Wedding Guest: Yes! Green-blue!ScenesRoss: Well go! Go move it! (He runs off.)ScenesChandler: Okay, you ready for the last picture?ScenesRoss: Yeah.ScenesChandler: Get ready to run. (Chandler walks over to the new bride.) Congratulations on your wedding. (He grabs her, kisses her, Ross takes the picture, and they both run out.)

rows.Scenes: Central Perk, continued from earlier.]
rows.Content: Tag: So, what’s this about?ScenesPhoebe: Rachel has something that she wants to tell you and umm, I believe that this is your red sweater.ScenesTag: No. (Unzips his coat.) This is my red sweater.ScenesPhoebe: Oh no. Could I get anyone a coffee or…poison? No? Just for me? Okay. (Walks away.)ScenesTag: What’s going on Rach?ScenesRachel: Nothing! Phoebe kinda made a mistake. But y’know you do wear that sweater a lot, are you involved in some kind of dare?ScenesTag: Y’know, I’m actually glad Phoebe called. (He pulls out a stool and Rachel sits down.) I know we broke up because you thought I wasn’t mature enough, but I’ve really grown up and think we should get back together.ScenesRachel: Oh, it’s just not the right time.ScenesTag: It is the right time. (Takes her hand.)ScenesRachel: Okay.ScenesTag: I’m ready for more.ScenesRachel: Tag…ScenesTag: Come on Rach, let’s give it another try.ScenesRachel: I’m having a baby.ScenesTag: Oh. (He drops her hand.)Scenes(Pause)ScenesRachel: You can go.ScenesTag: Thank you. (Gets up and hurries out.)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's, Obsessive Monica has finished opening all the presents. She’s ashamed of this, at least, because as someone enters…]
rows.Content: Monica: (throwing up the last present) I don’t know how any of these got opened?!ScenesJoey: (entering) You opened them all?ScenesMonica: I know! I know! I am a terrible person! I mean, Chandler is never going to trust me with anything ever again!ScenesJoey: Oh hey! You got my parent’s gift! (Holds it up.)ScenesMonica: Yeah. What is that?ScenesJoey: Well, I don’t know. I think it does something to salami.Scenes(Phoebe and Rachel enter.)ScenesMonica: Hey! How’d it go?ScenesJoey: Yeah. What-what did Tag say?ScenesRachel: Tag is not the father! And Joey knows now?ScenesJoey: I do Rach. I do, and I so happy for you. (They hug.)ScenesRachel: Oh wow, you didn’t even try to unhook my bra!ScenesMonica: So are you ever gonna tell whoever it is?ScenesRachel: No, I will. I’m just not up for it tonight.ScenesJoey: Hey Rach listen, no matter what this guy says I want you to know you’re not gonna be alone in this.ScenesRachel: I’m not?ScenesJoey: Listen I uh… (He takes her hand.) It’s a scary world out there especially if you’re a single mom. Y’know, I always felt like you and I have this-this special bond. Y’know? So, (gets down on one knee again) Rachel Green will you marry me?ScenesRachel: What?ScenesMonica: What?!ScenesPhoebe: What?!!ScenesJoey: Pheebs, give me the ring back!ScenesPhoebe: No!!ScenesRachel: No! Joey, oh you’re so sweet. You’re so-so sweet, honey. But I’m not, I’m not looking for a husband.ScenesJoey: (heartbroken) I understand.ScenesRachel: Now, if you will excuse me I am going to go and lie down. (Exits.)ScenesPhoebe: I can’t say that didn’t hurt. But I’ll take you back Joey Tribbiani.ScenesJoey: Uh yeah. Pheebs, listen about that. I only offered…ScenesPhoebe: Ooh! A Salami Buddy!ScenesJoey: There you go!Scenes(Chandler and Ross enter with the new pictures.)ScenesChandler: We’re back!ScenesMonica: Great! We’re hangin’ in the kitchen! (She drags him into the kitchen and turns his back to the living room) Let’s stay in the kitchen!ScenesChandler: It’s picture time.ScenesRoss: Now you are going to love these.ScenesChandler: (showing her the pictures) Here’s a picture of Ross. (Shows another one.) And that’s me. (Another one.) And that’s me and Ross. (Another one.) Oh-ho, that is a picture of our first kiss as a married couple.ScenesMonica: Wow! That is a great picture!ScenesChandler: Eh?ScenesMonica: Yeah! Oh and interesting because I found the cameras in one of our bags! (Throws them into his chest.)ScenesRoss: Huh, didn’t see that coming.ScenesChandler: Okay, so this isn’t a picture of our first, but it is a picture of my first kiss with…with this lady. Which by the look on your face I’m sure you’ll remember. So we don’t need—(Rips the picture)—There’s no need to have this picture. How about I take the real pictures and get them developed right now.ScenesMonica: That would be a good idea.ScenesChandler: Okay. (Sees the living room.) You opened all the presents without me?! I thought we were supposed to do that together!ScenesMonica: You kissed another woman!ScenesChandler: Call it even?!ScenesMonica: Okay! (They high-five and he walks out.)ScenesRoss: Well, I’m gonna go get these (the floral bouquet he walked in with) in some water.ScenesPhoebe: Wait you stole those from these people’s wedding?ScenesRoss: No-no, I took them from the hotel lobby. Yeah, they think they can charge me for some dirty movie and a bag of Mashuga nuts, they got another think coming. (Starts to leave.) Hey! My sweater! I’ve been looking for this for like a month!Scenes(He exits leaving a stunned Phoebe and Monica.)ScenesMonica and Phoebe: Oh my God!!ScenesJoey: (slow on the uptake) Oh my God!ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: A Street, Ross walks past Tag wearing the same red sweater.]
rows.Content: Ross: Hey! How you doing?ScenesTag: Good! Good, long time no see.ScenesRoss: Yeah.ScenesTag: Like your sweater.ScenesRoss: Oh hey, right back at ya.ScenesTag: Oh, it’s crazy about Rachel huh?ScenesRoss: Yeah. She—Well, she’s one crazy lady?ScenesTag: So whose is it?ScenesRoss: (shows Tag his sweater tag) Umm, I don’t some Italian guy. Come on, read your own label. See you later.ScenesTag: Okay.Scenes(They separate.)ScenesRoss: He is so weird.ScenesEndScenesThe One Where Rachel Tells…ScenesWritten by: Sherry Bilsing-Graham & Ellen PlummerScenesTranscribed by: Eric Aasen

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's, Monica and Chandler are getting ready to go on their honeymoon. Monica is entering from the bedroom.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Hey! Babe! Aren’t you excited we’re going on our honeymoon?ScenesMonica: Yeah I am!ScenesChandler: (singing) Bermuda, Bahama, come on pretty mama…ScenesMonica: That’s right. Get it out of your system while we’re alone.ScenesJoey: (entering with Phoebe) Hey!ScenesPhoebe: Yeah! Have a great honeymoon!ScenesChandler: I’d better go pack.ScenesMonica: Oh no, I already packed. The only thing I couldn’t find though was your Speedo.Scenes(Joey looks at him, Phoebe tries not to smile, and Chandler is shocked.)ScenesChandler: A Speedo? Uh, I don’t have a Speedo. I’m gonna go pack my regular long bathing suit. (Goes into the bedroom.)ScenesRachel: (entering) Oh good you’re still here!ScenesMonica: Hey!ScenesRachel: I want to tell you to have a good honeymoon! (Hugs Monica.)ScenesMonica: Thank you.ScenesRachel: And I also wanted you guys to know that I am telling the father today. (They all look at her expectantly) What? What? What?Scenes(Pause.)ScenesJoey: We know its Ross!ScenesRachel: How?! How do you know?ScenesPhoebe: It was his sweater, but—Oh my God!ScenesRachel: Oh, I so wanted Ross to know first, but I’m so relieved you guys know.ScenesMonica: This is so great! And I’m gonna be your baby’s aunt!ScenesRachel: I know! (They hug.)ScenesPhoebe: Me too! (Joins the hug.)ScenesJoey: I’m gonna be an uncle! Come here! (He joins the hug.)ScenesRachel: (breaking the hug) You’re all gonna be aunts and uncles.ScenesMonica: Yeah, but I’m the only one related by blood.ScenesRachel: Okay. Great! So now that you guys all know you can help me. Give me some advice on how I’m gonna tell Ross!ScenesMonica: Well, what were you gonna say?ScenesRachel: Well I was gonna tell him that I’m-I’m gonna have the baby and he can be as involved as he wants.ScenesJoey: Well that, that sounds good.ScenesRachel: Yeah but how do I start? I mean, what’s-what’s the first thing that I say? (They all pause to think.) Okay great! Thanks. (She starts to leave.)ScenesMonica: Hey! Good luck!ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, bye.ScenesJoey: Bye.Scenes(Rachel exits.)ScenesChandler: (entering) Hey, what was that all about?ScenesMonica: Well I guess there is no harm in telling you now, Rachel and Ross are gonna have a baby.ScenesChandler: (in a high pitched voice) What?! I didn’t even know that—Why didn’t you tell me?! (Pause) Why am I talking like this?!ScenesMonica: I didn’t think you could keep it a secret.ScenesChandler: (in the high pitched voice) What?! (Normal voice) I am an excellent secret keeper. I have kept all of our secrets.ScenesJoey: What secrets?ScenesChandler: Oh no-no Joey, I am not going to tell you because I am an excellent secret keeper.Scenes(The girls walk away.)ScenesJoey: (whispering to Chandler) You’ll tell me later?ScenesChandler: You already know.ScenesOpening Credits

rows.Scenes: Joey and Rachel's, Joey and Phoebe are entering.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Oh, it's so romantic to send people off on their honeymoon.ScenesJoey: Y’know, Monica and Chandler are married. Ross and Rachel are having a baby. Maybe you and I should do something.ScenesPhoebe: All in good time my love. All in good time. Oh shoot! I left my guitar in their apartment. Well you can let me in later.ScenesJoey: I don’t have a key, they took mine to give to you.ScenesPhoebe: What?! They took mine to give to you!ScenesJoey: Why would they take away our keys?ScenesPhoebe: Maybe they don’t trust us.ScenesJoey: No that’s not it. They let me keep my key the last time they were out of town.ScenesPhoebe: You mean the time you broke the ketchup bottle and cleaned it up with Monica’s guest towels?ScenesJoey: Hey, I washed those!ScenesPhoebe: No you didn’t.ScenesJoey: Yeah that didn’t sound like me.ScenesPhoebe: Well, what am I gonna do? I really need my guitar!ScenesJoey: Yeah, I have stuff in there too.ScenesPhoebe: What stuff?ScenesJoey: Monica’s chicken parm! I’ll take care of it. (He picks up the phone) Hey Mr. Treeger, it’s Joey Tribbiani. Listen, I need to get into Monica and Chandler’s apartment. It’s an emergency. (Listens) Uhh, gas leak! Yeah oh, and bring garlic bread. (Hangs up.)ScenesRoss: (entering) Hey!ScenesPhoebe: Did Rachel find you?ScenesRoss: No why?ScenesPhoebe: Oh she was looking for you.ScenesRoss: Oh well, I guess I’ll catch up with her later.ScenesPhoebe: Well, she really wanted to talk to you now.ScenesJoey: Yeah, it seemed pretty important.ScenesRoss: Oh no.ScenesPhoebe: What?ScenesRoss: I think I might know what this is about.Scenes(Phoebe and Joey trade looks)ScenesJoey: Really?ScenesRoss: Yeah. Uh, uh we promised we weren’t gonna tell anybody this but uh, about a month ago Rachel and I slept together.ScenesPhoebe: (deadpan) And?ScenesRoss: Wow! I thought you would be a little more shocked.ScenesPhoebe: Oh sorry. (Shocked) And?!ScenesRoss: Well, we-we said we’d just do it that one time but, but now I think she may wanna start things up again.ScenesJoey: Yeah, I don’t think that’s what it is.ScenesRoss: Why? What-what else could it be?ScenesJoey: Oh wow, I don’t feel well.ScenesRoss: I’m telling you. I’m telling you. That’s what it is. No wonder she was looking at me all funny during the wedding. She didn’t say anything to you?ScenesPhoebe: (To Joey) Maybe it’s something you ate?ScenesJoey: Please, just-just, just go and talk to Rachel.ScenesRoss: Yeah, I guess I should. (Starts to leave.) Man, y’know what I have to realize? Maybe I’m just not the type of guy women can have just one night with. Y’know, they-they always seem to want a little bit more. I should remember that. (He pauses and then exits.)

rows.Scenes: The Airport Ticket Counter, Monica and Chandler are standing in line behind another couple kissing who are next in line to be served.]
rows.Content: Ticket Agent: Next?Scenes(The kissing couple doesn’t move.)ScenesMonica: They’re kissing let’s just go around them.ScenesChandler: Oh honey, leave them alone, they’re in love.ScenesMonica: I’m in love too! But in an orderly fashion.ScenesTicket Agent: Next?ScenesMonica: (to the couple) Hi! Can you do that and walk? ‘Cause she said, "Next.Scenes(The couple moves up to the counter.)ScenesWoman: Sorry. We didn’t hear you; we’re on our honeymoon.ScenesTicket Agent: Oh, let me see what I can do. (Checks the computer) There are some first class seats available.ScenesMonica: (To Chandler) Did you hear that?! They bumped them up to first class because they are on their honeymoon! Come on! Let’s act like we’re on our honeymoon.ScenesChandler: We are on our honeymoon.ScenesMonica: Grab my ass!ScenesTicket Agent: Next?Scenes(They go up to the counter.)ScenesMonica: Hi, sorry. I almost didn’t hear you, because y’know I’m just so in love with my new husband. We’re on our honeymoon.ScenesTicket Agent: Congratulations. Okay, Mr. Bing you’ll be in 25J and Mrs. Bing you’ll be in 25K.ScenesMonica: Oh no, you see we’re on our honeymoon. So umm, can you do your little thing and bump us up to first class?ScenesTicket Agent: I’m sorry, all our first class seats are taken. That couple got the last two.ScenesMonica: You see, if we’d gone around them like I said, we—She would’ve given us those tickets. Damnit!ScenesChandler: 25J and K, any chance those aren’t together?

rows.Scenes: Joey and Rachel's, Phoebe and Joey are playing Rock ‘em, Sock ‘em Robots.]
rows.Content: Joey: I still can’t believe they took away my key. You trust me with yours.ScenesPhoebe: Of course I do! And I’m gonna give it back to you as soon as they’re done with it at the key shining place.Scenes(They hear a knocking sound coming from the hallway and go to investigate.)ScenesJoey: What the hell is that?Scenes(They go into the hallway and see Mr. Treeger watching one of New York’s bravest breakdown Monica and Chandler’s door with an ax.]ScenesJoey: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Treeger, what are you doing?ScenesMr. Treeger: You said there was a gas leak in here.ScenesPhoebe: Well why don’t you use your key?ScenesMr. Treeger: Because by the time I find it on this thing (Holds up a huge key ring with a thousand keys on it), the whole place might have exploded. If that happens at another building that I manage, people are gonna start asking questions. (To the fireman) Come on! Hurry up.Scenes(With a final swing the door gives way.)ScenesPhoebe: Oh! We could have done that.

rows.Scenes: The Airport, Chandler and Monica are following the previous couple through a tiny hallway that proves this is a set on a sound stage and not an actual airport, and see them enter the first class lounge.]
rows.Content: Monica: Look at that! Look at that! They’re going into the first class lounge! Do you know what they have in there?ScenesChandler: No.ScenesMonica: Me neither! We have to get in! (She runs through the door with Chandler in tow.)ScenesChandler: Just act like you belong.ScenesMonica: Oh my God! Oranges!ScenesChandler: Shh! (To the guy behind the counter) Nice to see you again. (They tries to walk past him.)ScenesAirline Employee: Uh sir, may I see your tickets please?ScenesChandler: Yes, of course. (Shows him the tickets.)ScenesAirline Employee: I’m sorry, would you move your thumb? I can’t see the seat number.ScenesChandler: Oh that’s all right, I have it memorized. It’s 1A.ScenesAirline Employee: (grabbing the ticket from him) Sir, this is not a first class ticket. I’m sorry.ScenesChandler: Apology accepted. Excuse us. (They try to enter again.)ScenesAirline Employee: Sir! I’m afraid I’m gonna have to ask you to leave.ScenesMonica: Fine. (Starts to walk away then she runs over and grabs an orange before she exits.) Go! Go! Go!

rows.Scenes: The Hallway Outside Ross’s Apartment, Ross is walking towards his apartment and sees Rachel sitting in front of the door.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (seeing him) Hi!ScenesRoss: Hi.ScenesRachel: Hi. (He helps her up.) Umm, I think there’s something that we really need to talk about.ScenesRoss: (quietly confident) I think we do. Why don’t we go inside? (They go inside.) Look uh, I know why you’re here.ScenesRachel: You do?ScenesRoss: Yeah, and to save you from any embarrassment umm, I think maybe I should talk first.ScenesRachel: (warily) Okay.ScenesRoss: Okay. (He sits her down in a chair.) Uh, Ross and Rachel. Rachel and Ross. That’s been one heck of a see-saw hasn’t it?ScenesRachel: (confused) What?ScenesRoss: I mean look, that-that one night we had was fun and…and certainly passionate, but don’t you think it’s better if we just stayed friends?ScenesRachel: Seriously. What?!ScenesRoss: Okay. Okay. Y’know what? If you want to, we can do it one more time. I mean I’d-I’d be okay with that. In fact, I have some time right now.ScenesRachel: Okay, y’know what? Can I, can I talk now?ScenesRoss: Oh sure. (He sits on the apothecary table and touches her hand.)ScenesRachel: (touches his knee) I’m pregnant. (Ross stops.) Ross? (Ross is staring off into space.) Ross? (Ross is still frozen) Okay, whenever you’re ready. (Sits back and opens her magazine.) And you’re the father by the way—but you got that…ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: Ross's Apartment, continued from earlier.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (closes her magazine) Can I get you some water?ScenesRoss: I’m good. I’m good.ScenesRachel: Ross, there is no pressure on you. Okay? I mean you can as involved as you want. (Ross nods.)ScenesRoss: Yeah, I need uh… I’m just—I don’t know—I don’t understand, umm, how this happened? We-we used a condom.ScenesRachel: I know. I know, but y’know condoms only work like 97% of the time.ScenesRoss: What? What? What?!! Well they should put that on the box!!!ScenesRachel: They do!ScenesRoss: No they don’t!!! (He runs to the bedroom to check and returns with his box of condoms.) Well they should put it in huge black letters!!!!ScenesRachel: Okay Ross come on let’s just forget about the condoms.ScenesRoss: Oh well I may as well have!ScenesRachel: Listen, y’know what? I was really freaked out too when I found out…ScenesRoss: Freaked out? Hey no, I’m not freaked out! I’m indignant! As a consumer!ScenesRachel: Y’know what? Let’s, let’s talk later.ScenesRoss: No! No! I want to talk now! Okay? I—In fact, (picks up the phone) I am going to talk to the president of the condom company!ScenesRachel: Okay, y’know maybe I should come back… (Starts to leave.)ScenesRoss: (grabs her) Shh! Shh! Shh!ScenesRachel: (stops) Okay.ScenesRoss: (on phone) Yeah I’ll press 1! (Presses one which allows Rachel to escape.)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's, Mr. Treeger has finished inspecting Monica and Chandler’s apartment.]
rows.Content: Mr. Treeger: I’ve looked everywhere. There’s no gas leak.ScenesJoey: (eating) Huh. So then I can heat this up? (Goes and does so.)ScenesMr. Treeger: Anyway uh, I’ll get moving on that new door.ScenesPhoebe: Oh great! And listen, could you do us a favor and not tell Chandler and Monica about this? ‘Cause y’know umm, they don’t-they don’t have any kids of their own and-and this door was like a child to them.ScenesMr. Treeger: Well I’m gonna have to put on a new lock, they’ll find out anyway.ScenesPhoebe: Oh no.ScenesMr. Treeger: (measures the top of the doorframe) Whoa! This looks like an all day job, I’ll have to cancel my yoga class. (Ross walks up.) Hey Ross!ScenesRoss: Hi.ScenesMr. Treeger: Could you tell Jasmine that I won't make it to yoga class today?ScenesRoss: Sure.ScenesMr. Treeger: Namaste. (Bows.)ScenesRoss: Namaste. (Bows.)Scenes(Treeger leaves and Ross notices the door.)ScenesRoss: Oh my God! What happened to the door?!ScenesJoey: So it’s noticeable huh?ScenesRoss: Look, is Rachel here? I really need to talk to her.ScenesPhoebe: Didn’t you two already talk?ScenesRoss: Yeah but uh… Okay, okay look you guys know that Rachel and I slept together, but there’s something else. (Pause) Rachel’s pregnant.ScenesJoey: (simultaneously) Oh my God!!! I can’t believe that!!ScenesPhoebe: (simultaneously) Holy mother of God!!!ScenesRoss: With my child.ScenesPhoebe: That is brand new information!!ScenesRoss: You already know don’t you?ScenesPhoebe: A little bit.ScenesJoey: How are you doing?ScenesRoss: Okay. Okay. I mean I’ll be okay. It’s just I don’t think I handled it very well.ScenesJoey: Well, what did you say to her?ScenesRoss: Nothing. But the complaint department at the condom company got an earful. And then when I turned around she was gone.ScenesPhoebe: Oh Ross.ScenesRoss: But hey, in my defense I-I just found out condoms are like only 97% effective.ScenesJoey: (shocked) What?ScenesRoss: I gotta go find her.ScenesJoey: Whoa! Hey! Whoa!! Hold up! Are you serious?! So like 3% of the time they don’t even work?! Huh? They should put that on the box!ScenesRoss: Evidently they do.ScenesJoey: What?! (Grabs his condoms from his pocket and looks.)

rows.Scenes: The Atlantis Resort, Chandler and Monica are arriving to check in, but are behind the couple from before again.]
rows.Content: Monica: I can’t believe we’re here.ScenesChandler: Oh you’ve got to be kidding me.ScenesMonica: What? (Monica sees the first couple and gasps.)ScenesFront Desk Clerk: As a wedding gift to you, the hotel would like to give you the honeymoon suite.ScenesMonica: No!! You have been screwing us all day!ScenesMan: Who are you?ScenesChandler: We’re you just ten seconds later!ScenesMonica: Yeah! You already got the first class tickets; you got the lounge! I mean we should get free stuff too! I mean you’re not the only ones on your honeymoon!ScenesWoman: Well you can have the suite if you want. We don’t care about where we stay. We’re here to celebrate our love together. We don’t have to get free stuff. We just want to be together.ScenesChandler: (looks at Monica then at them) We need the stuff.

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's, Joey is on the phone and Phoebe is watching him.]
rows.Content: Joey: Hey Monica it’s Joey. Listen uh, Phoebe and I smell gas comin’ from your apartment.ScenesMonica: What? Are you serious?! (To Chandler) Joey smells gas!ScenesChandler: What else is new?ScenesJoey: Yeah and we’d go check it out, but you took away our keys.ScenesMonica: Well do something! Get in there!ScenesJoey: How? I guess I could break down your door.ScenesMonica: Yeah! Do that!ScenesJoey: And-and you won’t blame us for any damage? (Gives Phoebe a thumbs up.)ScenesMonica: No! (Pause) Are you doing it?! I don’t hear anything! Come on!ScenesJoey: Uh, okay I’ll-I’ll-I’ll break it down. (He hands the phone to Phoebe, gets up, picks up a chair, and starts banging it on the floor.)ScenesPhoebe: Oh hey hi, he’s doing it. He’s breaking down the door. (The chair breaks in half.) Okay, we’re in. (She hangs up the phone.)

rows.Scenes: A doctor’s office, Rachel is on an examining table with her legs in the stirrups.]
rows.Content: Nurse: Okay Rachel, are you comfortable?ScenesRachel: (sighs) If I said I was, would you judge me?ScenesNurse: The doctor will be here in a minute to do your sonogram.ScenesRachel: Okay. (The nurse exits.) Oh man, I swear if they sold these at Pottery Barn…Scenes(There’s a knock on the door and Ross enters.)ScenesRoss: Hi!ScenesRachel: (shocked) Hi!ScenesRoss: Uh we-we need to talk.ScenesRachel: Uh-uh-uh, right now? Because I’ve kinda got an el fresco situation going on over here.ScenesRoss: Please, please I want to apologize for the way I acted earlier today.ScenesRachel: Okay Ross that’s fine, but can you please stand near my head?ScenesRoss: What? Oh yeah. (He moves next to her head.) I’m sorry. I mean I-I think I went a little crazy. I mean I was thinking about myself when I (Wanders towards Rachel’s feet) really—I should have been thinking about you Rach…ScenesRachel: Okay. Head Ross! Head Ross! Head Ross!ScenesRoss: Right! Right! I just—I want you to know that I’m going to be there through this whole thing, okay? Okay? The doctor’s appointments, the uh, the Lamaze classes, uh baby-proofing the apartment—Although we could probably worry about that ‘til after we get married.ScenesRachel: What married?ScenesRoss: Well yeah, I think we should get married.ScenesRachel: What, because that’s your answer to everything?ScenesRoss: No, because that’s the right thing to do.ScenesRachel: Yeah, maybe if you’re in love. But Ross, we are not in love, are we?ScenesRoss: No but…but still you can’t possibly do this alone.ScenesRachel: Excuse me?ScenesRoss: Come on Rach, you can’t even eat alone in a restaurant.ScenesRachel: What?!ScenesRoss: I’m just saying if you can’t eat by yourself, how do you expect to have a baby by yourself?ScenesRachel: I can too eat by myself!ScenesRoss: When have you ever?ScenesRachel: When certain people leave the table and I am not finished!ScenesRoss: Well certain other people take two hours to eat a bowl of soup!ScenesRachel: Oh please, you inhale your food!ScenesRoss: I grew up with Monica! If you didn’t eat fast you didn’t eat!!ScenesDr. Long: (entering) Am I interrupting?ScenesRachel: Oh no Dr. Long, please come in. This is Ross, he is the father.ScenesRoss: But not the husband, because evidently she can do this alone.ScenesDr. Long: Huh. Nice to meet you. I’ll get started on this.ScenesRoss: (To Rachel, standing by her feet) I don’t know why you can’t admit that you need me.ScenesRachel: I do need you! I need you to stand near my head!ScenesDr. Long: Okay, everything looks good. Here it is on the screen. (We see Ross and Rachel looking at the screen.) Here is your uterus. And right here is your baby.ScenesRoss: Oh my God.ScenesRachel: Wow. There it is, I see it.ScenesDr. Long: Congratulations. I’ll give you two a minute.ScenesRachel: Okay.ScenesRoss: Thank you.Scenes(Dr. Long exits and Rachel starts to cry.)ScenesRoss: Pretty amazing huh?ScenesRachel: I don’t see it!ScenesRoss: What? What?!ScenesRachel: I can’t see it!ScenesRoss: You-you just said that you did!ScenesRachel: I know, I lied! I didn’t want her to think I was a terrible mother! I can’t even see my own baby!ScenesRoss: Oh sure, come here! (Sits her up) Sure you can! Uh, look come here look, (rolls the machine closer) it’s-it’s-it’s, it’s right there (Points).ScenesRachel: Oh. Oh, it’s beautiful. I see it now.ScenesRoss: Do you really?ScenesRachel: No, I don’t see it!ScenesRoss: Come on! Come on! Here, okay-okay, you see this? (Points) This tiny thing that looks like a peanut?ScenesRachel: Yeah.ScenesRoss: Sweetie that’s it.ScenesRachel: That’s it? Well I saw that! Ohh-ohh-oh, thank you.ScenesRoss: You’re welcome.ScenesRachel: Wow! I can’t believe that’s our baby.ScenesRoss: Yeah, that’s our baby.ScenesClosing Credits

rows.Scenes: Joey and Rachel's, Joey and Phoebe are there as Rachel and Ross return from the doctor’s appointment.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Hi.ScenesJoey: Hey!ScenesPhoebe: Hey! So how was the doctor?ScenesRachel: Oh, everything went great.ScenesPhoebe: Good.ScenesRoss: Oh hey, show them the picture of your uterus.Scenes(She does so.)ScenesPhoebe: Oh.ScenesJoey: I don’t see the baby. Where is it?ScenesRachel: Oh no, I know I couldn’t see it either at first, but it’s right umm… (Starts to cry) Ross, I lost it again.ScenesRoss: Oh. (He takes the picture and hugs her.ScenesEndScenesThe One With The VideotapeScenesWritten by: Scott SilveriScenesTranscribed by: Eric Aasen

rows.Scenes: The Hallway, Chandler and Monica are returning from their honeymoon.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Wait. Before we go in, I just want you to know I love you. I had a great time on our honeymoon, and I can’t wait to go in there and spend the rest of our life together.ScenesMonica: You’re really sticking with the shell necklace huh? (Points to necklace of shells he’s wearing.)Scenes(Joey and Phoebe burst forth from his apartment.)ScenesPhoebe: Hi!ScenesJoey: Hey! You’re back! (Hugs and kisses all around.)ScenesMonica: Hi sweetie!ScenesPhoebe: Come on in!Scenes(They grab the luggage and drag it into Joey and Rachel’s forcing Monica and Chandler to follow.)ScenesPhoebe: So how was the honeymoon?ScenesMonica: Oh, so much fun. But the best part is, we met this incredible couple on the way back.ScenesPhoebe: That was the best part? (To Chandler) Good honeymooning tiger.ScenesMonica: No, they were really cool. They were on their honeymoon too!ScenesChandler: They’re terrific, and they live right here in the city.ScenesMonica: Yeah, can we go call them? Is it too soon to call? I wanna call.ScenesChandler: I’m sorry, we’re just kinda excited because we finally have a couple to hang out with.ScenesMonica: I know.ScenesJoey: A couple? Like two people? Like (points to himself) one (points to Phoebe), two people?ScenesMonica: This is different! Greg and Jenny are in a relationship.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, Greg and Jenny yuck! (Angrily) Hi Greg, I’m Chandler this is Monica. Hi Monica, this is Jenny. Hi Jenny. Hi Greg.ScenesChandler: Listen, they are really great. If you just got a chance…ScenesJoey: Y’know what? Why don’t you just give us our souvenirs and get the hell out of here?ScenesChandler: We really…didn’t get a chance to…ScenesPhoebe: You have got to be kidding me!ScenesMonica: We didn’t get anything for anyone.ScenesJoey: Hm-mm! Yeah nice necklace!ScenesMonica: That you can have.ScenesOpening CreditsScenes{Transcriber’s Note: Tradition was broken here as there were no commercials immediately after the opening credits, just more show.}

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's, Ross and Rachel are entering with the rest of the gang already inside.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Hi!ScenesAll: Hey!ScenesRoss: Hello!ScenesRachel: Welcome home.ScenesRoss: So, how was the honeymoon?ScenesMonica: It was great! It was great! How about you?! I mean you’re having a baby!ScenesRachel: Oh! Look! I have a sonogram picture!ScenesMonica: Oh great! (Shows them the picture.)ScenesChandler: Ross! It’s got your wavy black lines!ScenesMonica: All right, so now that Ross knows can you tell us y’know how it happened? I mean, when did it happen? How many times did it happen?ScenesPhoebe: Monica! That’s not right! Start with where.Scenes(Rachel looks at Ross and gets his approval.)ScenesRachel: Well it happened about six weeks ago, and uh I had just got home from work and Ross was already there ‘cause I guess he had been hanging out with Joey.ScenesJoey: You’re welcome buddy.ScenesRoss: (glaring at him) Yeah, thanks. (Joey nods no problem.)ScenesRachel: And so I had a lot of work to do so Ross, nice guy that he is, offered to help me out. And then we had a little wine, we got to talking, and the next thing you know out of nowhere Ross comes on to me.ScenesRoss: (laughs) Umm that’s…that’s a little misleading.ScenesRachel: What is?ScenesRoss: The lie you just told.ScenesRachel: That-that you came on to me?ScenesRoss: There’s the one!ScenesRachel: But you did! I mean, let’s be honest.ScenesRoss: Yes let’s. Y’know what? Uh, it’s-it’s not important. What is important is that, is that we’re having a baby. And it’s not—Doesn’t matter who came on to who.ScenesJoey: Whom. (Everyone looks at him shocked.) That’s right.ScenesRachel: You know you kissed me first.ScenesRoss: What? What?! You were begging me to kiss you! You-you-you were sending me signals all over the place!ScenesRachel: I was sending you signals?ScenesRoss: Yeah!ScenesRachel: Oh please. Okay, anyone in this room think that I would send Ross begging symbols, please show of hands. (Ross raises his hand and no one else.)ScenesRoss: Y’know what?! It doesn’t matter! It doesn’t matter what you believe! What matters is what happened!ScenesRachel: Okay. So these signals Ross, explain this to me, ‘cause maybe I need to be more careful. I mean, am I sending you these signals right now?ScenesRoss: Y’know what? Y’know what? Rachel, just-just drop it.ScenesRachel: No please, show me how I begged you!ScenesRoss: I can show you, I have it on videotape! (Stunned silence) It’s an expression.ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's, time has lapsed, Phoebe, Joey, Chandler, and Monica are sitting at the kitchen table.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: I can’t believe he taped the two of them having sex!ScenesJoey: Yeah! You gotta tell a girl before you tape her. Such a rookie mistake.ScenesChandler: Y’know who has a great video camera?ScenesPhoebe: (nasally) Greg and Jenny?ScenesMonica: Do you still wanna call ‘em? I wanna call ‘em.ScenesChandler: Let’s call ‘em.ScenesJoey: Yeah! Ask them if they brought their friends any souvenirs!Scenes(Monica goes over and dials their number.)ScenesMonica: (on phone) Hello? (Listens) Eighth street deli?ScenesJoey: Hey, hang up! You get food poisoning just talkin’ to that place.ScenesMonica: (on phone) Uh sorry, wrong number. (Hangs up)ScenesChandler: Here you go. (Shows her the number again.)ScenesMonica: (on phone) Hello? (Listens) (To All) It’s the deli again!ScenesJoey: All right! I’ll have a sandwich!ScenesMonica: (hangs up) I don’t think this number’s right!Scenes(Joey and Phoebe laugh.)ScenesChandler: What?ScenesPhoebe: You got fake numbered.ScenesMonica: What?! People don’t do that!ScenesJoey: Oh I think we do.ScenesMonica: They gave us a fake number? Why? Why would they do that?ScenesChandler: I don’t know! You were a delight to talk to. You asked all those insightful, great questions.ScenesMonica: And you’ve never been funnier. Joke, joke, joke, you were a hoot!ScenesJoey: Y’know what? Don’t worry about it, you still got me and Phoebe.ScenesPhoebe: Excuse me, I don’t want Greg and Jenny’s rejects.ScenesRoss: (entering) Rachel won’t talk to me! She won’t even open the door!ScenesPhoebe: Hmm, I wonder why. Pervert!ScenesRoss: Okay, listen I am not a pervert!ScenesPhoebe: That’s like the pervert motto! Yeah! Yeah! They have you raise your right hand, put your left hand down your pants, and repeat that!ScenesRoss: Filming Rachel is not something I planned. Okay look, here’s what happened, and Joey you-you can back me up on this. All right, about-about a month and a half ago I came to you with a problem? Umm, a personal thing.ScenesJoey: Personal thing? What personal thing? I don’t know.ScenesRoss: About…about sex? (Joey looks at him confused) That I hadn’t had sex in months?ScenesJoey: (laughs) Yeah I knew what you were talkin’ about.ScenesSix Weeks Earlier

rows.Scenes: Joey and Rachel's, Joey is reading a cereal box as Ross enters wearing the red sweater.]
rows.Content: Ross: Hey!ScenesJoey: Hey.ScenesRoss: Do you have a minute? I’d like to talk to you about something I’m, I’m really uncomfortable talking about.ScenesJoey: Sure. What? About uh, you showering with your mom?ScenesRoss: I actually had a topic in mind! I’m, I’m kinda going through a dry spell, sex wise.ScenesJoey: Whoa, for like months?ScenesRoss: Five to be lying, six.ScenesJoey: Six months? Whoa that’s rough.ScenesRoss: Well, I mean it’s not all bad. I’m learning to appreciate the uh, smaller things in life. Like the sound of a bird and the color of the sky.ScenesJoey: The sky’s blue Ross and I had sex yesterday!ScenesRoss: Please, help me! I have a date tonight. It has to go well okay—I’m scared for my health!ScenesJoey: Okay. Okay. Umm…Ooh! Oh-oh, I got something. It’s this story I came up with, very romantic. I swear any woman that hears it; they’re like putty.ScenesRoss: Really? Well then tell it to me.ScenesJoey: Okay. Now you’re gonna want to have sex with me when you hear it, but you have to remember it is just the story.ScenesRoss: (sarcastic) I’ll try to control myself.ScenesJoey: Okay. (Clears throat) Years ago, when I was backpacking across Western Europe…ScenesRoss: (laughs) You were backpacking across Western Europe?ScenesJoey: Have a nice six more months Ross! (Starts to leave.)ScenesRoss: (stopping him) Okay! Okay! Okay. I’m sorry. Please, please, you were in Western Europe and?ScenesJoey: I was just outside Barcelona hiking in the foothills of Mount Tibidabo. I was at the end of this path and I came to a clearing and there was a lake, very secluded. And there were tall trees all around. (Whispering) It was dead silent. Gorgeous. (Softly) And across the lake I saw…a beautiful woman…bathing herself…but she was crying…ScenesRoss: (intently listening) Why?

rows.Scenes: Ross's Apartment, Ross is on his date with Kristen and they’re drinking wine.]
rows.Content: Kristen: Umm, this is great wine.ScenesRoss: It’s from France…In Europe…Western Europe. Y’know umm, a few years ago I actually was backpacking across Western Europe.ScenesKristen: Really?ScenesRoss: Uh-hmm—Wait! It gets better. Um, yeah I was in Barcelona.ScenesKristen: I studied for a year in Barcelona. (Ross is stunned and worried.)ScenesRoss: Anyway, umm so I was um, I was hiking…ScenesKristen: I love hiking!ScenesRoss: (whines) Oh that’s great! I was hiking along the foothills of Mount Tibidaybo…ScenesKristen: I think its Tibidabo.ScenesRoss: Okay! Do you wanna tell the story?!

rows.Scenes: Joey and Rachel's, Joey is standing at the counter as Ross enters.]
rows.Content: Joey: Whoa! What are you doing here? How did your date go?ScenesRoss: Great! I’m across the street having sex with her right now. Your story sucks!ScenesJoey: Hey! Look, if it didn’t work it’s because you didn’t tell it right! Show me how you did it.ScenesRoss: No! No, I don’t…don’t want to.ScenesJoey: How long since you’ve seen a girl naked?ScenesRoss: I was backpacking across Western Europe.ScenesJoey: I’m not feeling it.ScenesRoss: I was just outside Barcelona, hiking…ScenesJoey: No! No! No Ross! I’m not hot! Are you hot?ScenesRoss: It’s been six months! I’m always hot!ScenesJoey: Well you’re not selling the story! It’s like; it’s like you don’t believe it! Look, I gotta go. I got a date, but try this. Do what I do when I’m preparing for an audition. Okay? I’ll set you up with my video camera and you can record yourself and-and see what you’re doing wrong.ScenesRoss: I’ll try that.ScenesJoey: All right now… All right, you’re all set up. You’re good to go. Just hit record. All right?ScenesRoss: Thanks.ScenesJoey: Good luck.ScenesRoss: Thanks. And-and hey Joe?ScenesJoey: Yeah?ScenesRoss: Listen, if you ever have any problem with the ladies you know I’ll help you out.ScenesJoey: (trying not to laugh) That means a lot to me man. (Exits.)Scenes(Ross pours himself a glass of wine, hits record, and sits down in front of the camera.)ScenesRoss: Hello! Can I get you anything? Huh? Lens cleaner? Your battery okay? (Rachel bursts in carrying two boxes and Ross jumps up.) Rachel!ScenesRachel: Oh Ross!ScenesRoss: Hi!ScenesRachel: Thank God you’re here! You have to help me! Were you just talking to yourself?ScenesRoss: That’s less embarrassing, yes. Yes I was.Scenes(They sit down on the couch, which is in front of the still recording camera.)ScenesRoss: (voiceover) So when she came in, I got distracted and totally forgot about the camera. [Cut back to the present day.] It kept rolling and recorded everything.Scenes(Pause)ScenesChandler: Yeah, we’re gonna need to see that tape. (They rest of them agree.)ScenesMonica: Yeah, definitely.ScenesRoss: What a great idea! That will get Rachel to forgive me!ScenesJoey: Y’know what? This is not fair to her. Let’s just forget the tape!ScenesRoss: Thank you. (Joey mouths to Ross, "You’ll show me right?") No!ScenesJoey: You’re right. (Mouths, "I know you’ll show me, right?)ScenesRoss: Joey! No!ScenesJoey: Loud and clear! (Mouths, "You’ll show me," and nods.)Scenes(Ross storms out.)

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's, Monica, Chandler, Joey, and Phoebe are now sitting in the living room.]
rows.Content: Monica: I still don't get why Greg and Jenny would give us a fake number.ScenesJoey: Y’know, if they knew what they were doing they probably didn’t give you real names either.ScenesMonica: Okay, maybe people give out fake numbers, but they don’t give out fake names.ScenesJoey: Oh yeah? (To Phoebe) Hi, Ken Adams, nice to meet you.ScenesPhoebe: Regina Philange. (Ken and Regina shake hands.)ScenesChandler: I still don’t get it, we didn’t do anything wrong.ScenesMonica: I know! Although, you did tell an awful lot of jokes.ScenesChandler: I thought you said those jokes were funny. Joke! Joke! Joke!ScenesMonica: (rolling her head from side to side) Joke. Joke. Blah! Blah! (Joey and Phoebe laugh.)ScenesChandler: Well maybe it was all of your questions.ScenesMonica: What about my questions?ScenesChandler: The sheer volume, it was like flying with the Riddler!ScenesMonica: Oh, I’m sorry. Was that another joke?ScenesChandler: (angrily) Was that another question?ScenesRachel: (entering) Hey! Is Ross still here?ScenesJoey: Uh no Rach, he’s gone. But listen, he told us what happened and it does, it sounds like an honest mistake.ScenesRachel: Oh really? Well how would you like it if I had sex with you and I taped it? (Joey smiles luridly) Oh forget it! (Ross enters.) Oh there he is now, the father of my child, the porn king of the west village.ScenesRoss: Look, it was accident! Okay? I-I feel bad that it happened, but I swear, I didn’t even watch it! Anyway, here. (He takes the tape out of his coat pocket.) I thought you might be more comfortable destroying it yourself. (Tosses her the tape.)ScenesRachel: Thank you. (She sets it on the floor and is about to stomp on it with her shoe when the rest of the gang jumps up and yells simultaneously.) What? (They all yell again.) You don’t want to see this do you?ScenesMonica: Hell yeah!!!ScenesRachel: I am not gonna show you this!ScenesPhoebe: No! Not the sex part, just the stuff leading up to it.ScenesRoss: Forget it, she’s destroying it.ScenesPhoebe: Okay fine! Fine! We’ll just have to think of some other way to put the whole ‘Who came onto who,’ thing to rest! Come on now, think!!ScenesRoss: Look, forget it Phoebe. Okay? It’s Rachel’s tape and she can do whatever she wants with it. And she wants to destroy it. So, end of story.ScenesRachel: I wanna see it.ScenesRoss: What?!ScenesRachel: Clearly you don’t want people to see this tape. Now I don’t want people to see this tape either, but you so badly don’t people to see it makes me want to see it. You see?ScenesJoey: (confused) Are we watchin’ the tape or not?!ScenesRoss: I don’t want people to see it for your sake.ScenesRachel: Ahh, I don’t believe you. I think you don’t want them to see you begging me. (Goes to put the tape in the VCR)ScenesRoss: Rachel, please…ScenesRachel: Ah, a little preview!ScenesRoss: Fine. Fine, but I want the record to show that I tried to take the high road, because in about five minutes I’m gonna be saying…(He laughs and points at Rachel sarcastically.)Scenes(They both sit down.)ScenesRachel: Okay, here we go. (Pushes play.)ScenesRoss: (on tape) Hello! Can I get you anything?ScenesJoey: (To Phoebe) I’m so happy!ScenesCommercial Break

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's, the scene is continued from earlier.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (on tape) Oh, thank God you’re here! You have to help me!
